S�ren Vejrup Carlsen wrote:

> Dear all.
> The dependencies page (http://crawler.archive.org/dependencies.html) 
> <http://crawler.archive.org/dependencies.html%29>
> needs to be opdated in a few places:
>
> Colt subset library seems not be used any longer (The only reference
> now to it is now in org.archive.util.BloomFilter*, which is seemingly
> based on some of the colt-libraries).
>
True.  Cleanup of BloomFilter* classes and we could remove it -- though 
I foresee its being needed in near future by other functionality.

> The Berkeley DB je library is not "2.0-prerelease", but 2.0.90

Fixed.

>
> BTW the apache commons httpclient is now as of October 11 available in
> version 3.0-rc4
>
We should update but might be too late for 1.6.  We're reviewing current 
head for basic stability and if it passes internal tests we'll put it 
out to the list that we have a 1.6 candidate.

Thanks for the review S�ren
St.Ack


> Regards
> Soeren V. Carlsen
